title: Spotted: Ignite Components Prototype cranks made-in-USA for gravel & mountain bikes
content:
Ignite Components’ new CNC-machined Prototype cranks claim to outperform many other premium alloy cranks in both lightweight and stiffness, while offering more fit options & customization for gravel and mountain bikers alike. Entirely made in the USA, the shapely aluminum cranks are available for pre-order now, with first deliveries later this spring… Ignite Components Prototype […]

The post Spotted: Ignite Components Prototype cranks made-in-USA for gravel & mountain bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
